name: Ship-Tec
description:
You are the captain of an airship, your motor broke down, and you need to fix it, soon. 

Sadly you dont actualy have any knowledge of your ship,

since you bought it to get away from something.

You, as the captain, woke up from your usual daytime nap. 

From the noise of your ship crashing.

But thankfully it landed in the ocean, but soon it will be nighttime, 

and the ocean isn't very kind at night.

Quickly, you need to fix it, before the ocean takes you.   

The game plays on an airship, in the 19th century.

The Ship has many rooms, who seem very fancy, but most things are broken

or have parts missing. 

The ship is filled with items, that you got gifted a long time ago.

Ship-Tec's mechanics are revolved around solving puzzles, 

riddles & finding objects or clues that will help you solving said things.

Made in Unreal Engine, Blender, Substance Painter & Designer.

It's made by SadCattle for their 4th Semester project at the HTK Academy.

All sounds are from WeLoveIndies!

Special thanks to everyone who helped me getting through this, it was a ride.
